fields.request: Verify Odoo chat bridge forwards visitor conversations
fields.request_details:
1. Configure an Odoo chat bridge pointing to a sandbox mail.channel and save it with a verified Odoo employee profile.
2. Submit a visitor message through the public chat widget and confirm the bridge posts the formatted transcript in the target Odoo channel.
3. Join the same session as a staff user and send a reply from Arthexis, verifying the staff response is forwarded with the appropriate metadata in Odoo.
